name: Mastery of Champions
description:
An Auto Chess Battle Brawler for VR

In the same vein as Dota Underlords and other Auto Battlers, this early access VR game is... 

  • A super early demo and is FREE to download.
  • Tested to work on Oculus Rift.

Please leave feedback and comments or drop by the discord to help with the development of the game: https://discord.gg/4Ytx3rM

Includes Spectator Cam with FOV fix and smoothing for Content Creators.

Donations are greatly appreciated.
